sentence: The other shows featured members from the select committee on January 6, including Reps. Adam Schiff (D-CA), Liz Cheney (R-WY), and Bennie Thompson (D-MS).
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Sunday Shows Were Hyperfocused on Reminding Everyone About January 6
